backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining types and storage for experiences, users, friendships, messages, and exposing query functions for retrieving experiences.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of numerous frontend files describing their roles in routing, UI layout, auth, and experience features.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes and applying global background/text rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx with favicon and metadata.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and wraps the app with ThemeProvider and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccountsDis: Card component prompting users to log in or sign up when access is restricted.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthButtons: Renders login/signup or logout buttons based on session auth state.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireProf: Auth guard that fetches user data when logged in and shows login/signup prompt otherwise.
frontend/src/components/experiences/Crea: Button to follow or unfollow a creator using social-following hooks with authentication checks and toasts.
frontend/src/components/experiences/Expe: Displays an experience card with thumbnail, title, description, creator info, and navigation to the experience page.
Renders a grid of experience cards with loading skeletons and an empty-state message.
Provides thumbs-up/down rating buttons with authentication checks and rating mutations.
frontend/src/components/experiences/InGa: Implements an in-game menu allowing players to leave, reset character, or open settings via dialogs.
frontend/src/components/experiences/Publ: Dialog for creating and publishing a new experience, including fields, thumbnail upload, and submission handling.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Defines the main app layout with header, footer, sidebar, and routed content area.
frontend/src/components/layout/AuthChang: Shows a banner notifying users about authentication changes and restrictions.
frontend/src/components/layout/LeftSideb: Provides a sidebar navigation menu with links to profile, social, inventory, groups, and settings.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Renders the site footer with copyright info and a link attribution to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Displays the site header with logo, navigation links, auth buttons, and mobile menu handling.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileH: Shows a user's profile header with avatar, display name, and quick navigation buttons.
frontend/src/components/social/Following: Renders a panel listing followed creators, supports unfollowing, and displays loading skeletons or empty state.
frontend/src/components/social/FriendsPa: Provides friend search, friend requests, pending request handling, and unfriend actions with loading states.
frontend/src/components/social/MessagesP: Implements user search, selecting a recipient, viewing messages, and sending direct messages.
frontend/src/components/social/PartiesPa: Static placeholder panel announcing a future party system feature.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches the backend actor based on the user’s identity and invalidates related queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Light wrapper exposing current user session state from useSessionAuth.
frontend/src/hooks/useExperiences.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and searching experiences via the backend actor, plus placeholders for create and rate mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, including login, logout, identity loading, and status handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for user profiles and experience data, with many backend methods still unimplemented.
frontend/src/hooks/useSessionAuth.ts: Implements session-based auth state with temporary mock login and signup until backend support exists.
frontend/src/hooks/useSocialFollowing.ts: Placeholder hooks for following creators, all returning static data or throwing errors due to missing backend.
frontend/src/hooks/useSocialFriends.ts: Defines friend list, requests, and mutation hooks, all stubbed pending backend implementation.
frontend/src/hooks/useSocialMessages.ts: Provides message fetching and sending hooks with placeholder behavior awaiting backend support.
frontend/src/hooks/useSocialParties.ts: Stub hook for retrieving the current party, disabled until backend features are added.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserDiscovery.ts: Implements disabled user search returning empty results until backend session-based search exists.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Provides profile fetching and signup hooks, all disabled or throwing due to missing backend.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets global Tailwind styles and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point initializing React Query and Internet Identity provider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AvatarShop.tsx: UI page showing categories and a coming-soon notice for the Avatar Shop.
frontend/src/pages/Create.tsx: Renders the Create page with feature cards and authentication gating for creation tools.
frontend/src/pages/DiniBucks.tsx: Displays Dini Bucks info, balance (if authenticated), and feature cards for earning and spending.
frontend/src/pages/Discover.tsx: Provides search, trending listings, category browsing, and experience publishing for authenticated users.
frontend/src/pages/ExperienceDetails.tsx: Shows details for a single experience with play handling, creator info, and rating controls.
frontend/src/pages/Groups.tsx: Displays the Groups page with a placeholder indicating no joined groups.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Renders the home page with recommended experiences, user greeting, and friend activity section.
frontend/src/pages/Inventory.tsx: Shows the user’s inventory page with an empty-state message for items.
frontend/src/pages/Login.tsx: Implements a login form with validation, error handling, and redirects on successful authentication.
frontend/src/pages/Profile.tsx: Displays the authenticated user's profile details and account info behind a profile-required wrapper.
frontend/src/pages/Settings.tsx: Renders a placeholder settings page with account settings UI structure.
frontend/src/pages/SignUp.tsx: Provides a signup form with field validation, error handling, and redirects after account creation.
frontend/src/pages/Social.tsx: Shows a tabbed social interface for friends, messages, parties, and following, requiring authentication.
frontend/src/utils/sessionToken.ts: Manages storing, retrieving, and clearing session tokens in localStorage.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using URLSearchParams and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, animations, and plugins for the frontend UI.
project_state.json: Defines the project's current state, including schema version, existing features, pending feature requests, and metadata for planning. Lists authentication-related upgrades and backend session feature requests.
